title: Rooting for EU this weekend
body: Hoping that OG and FNC represent this weekend. It would be great to have a non-Eastern team win Worlds.

replies.body:
I can't decide if I  should go for SKT or OG. I want Korea to lose, but I also really REALLY want to see a FNC/SKT rematch. So I am actually kinda want SKT to win over OG. 

Still hope Fnatic takes it all.
I want OG to win just to piss off all the Korean fanboys on here.

If Fnatic loses, I really hope OG wins.

If Fnatic wins, I can accept either result, because if SKT wins, I get a rematch of Fnatic vs SKT, and if OG wins, I get see Monte's face. So either way I get pleasure out of the deal. 

Really hope we don't have an all Korean Finals though.
Yeah, an all Korean final would suck. Everyone knows SKT will win it then, no contest.
I always root for the underdogs, cause I love upsets, so go KOO and OG!
Idk if koo over fnc is a big upset that one could easily go either way.
